document_data.name: Cerebral Parasite
document_data.mainbody: '''Cerebral parasites''' were a type of flea-sized creature that fed on [[psionic]] activity.
document_data.Description: These creatures were not visible to most creatures and could only be detected by psionically examining an individual's personal aura.
document_data.Behavior: Cerebral parasites were attracted towards and would attack any creature that got within {{SI|1|ft|long=yes}} of them that possessed some form of psionics.
document_data.Biology: Whenever an individual they were infesting used their psionic abilities, whether offensive or defense, a cerebral parasite would drain some of their energy. Once this occurred six times a cerebral parasite would reproduce another of their kind.
document_data.Ability: These creatures could not be attacked by psionic means. Once infested with them, an individual could only be rid of cerebral parasites by means of the [[spell]] ''[[cure disease]]''.

Ecology.Diet: Cerebral parasites fed solely upon psionic energy.
Ecology.Habitats: They could be found almost anywhere, even on the [[Ethereal plane|Ethereal]] and [[Astral plane]]s. They were considered to be commonly encountered creatures within those two [[plane]]s.
Ecology.Relationships: Cerebral parasites sometimes served the [[duergar]] deities [[Deep Duerra]] and [[Laduguer]].<ref>
